items.title: A24's New Horror Movie Looks Like The Perfect Follow-Up To Record-Breaking $91 Million Hit
items.description: A24's new horror movie already seems to have the potential to become the perfect follow-up to an acclaimed, record-breaking $91 million hit from 2023.

items.title: Sentry vs. The Avengers: Who Would Actually Win?
items.description: Thunderbolts* introduces Lewis Pullman's Sentry as one of the MCU's most powerful characters, virtually on the same power level as all the Avengers.

items.title: I'm Convinced The MCU Just Gave Sentry A Major Power Downgrade Based On 1 Thunderbolts* Line
items.description: Thunderbolts* introduced the equivalent of DC's Superman to the MCU, but I think Marvel Studios nerfed his powers thanks to one important line.

items.title: Joshua Jackson, Jodie Turner-Smith Settle Divorce, Battle Over Kid's School
items.description: Joshua Jackson and Jodie Turner-Smith are on the same page when it comes to most of their divorce terms -- but when it comes to grade school, they're ...

items.title: President Trump Posts A.I.-Generated Photo of Himself As the Pope
